marginalia.anchor_text: Oportet diuidere ascendentem in uno die coeli quantitatem; per motum Lunae

position.marginalia_text: Diuide ascende[n]te[m] in toto anno coeli qua[n]titate[m] p[er] ☉ motu[m] in anno

marginalia.translation: Divide the ascending quantity of the sky in a whole year through the motion of the Sun in a year.

marginalia.anchor_text: Vide quibus delectetur homo, & habebis Planetam praedominantem qualitatibus animi

position.marginalia_text: Ex ho[min]is studio voluntario, q[ui]s planeta ei pr[ae]sit

marginalia.translation: From the voluntury studio of men, which place may be in charge of him.

position.marginalia_text: Eade[m] r[ati]o et in ☉ haberi / et alijs planetis potest

marginalia.translation: The same argument can be held even for the Sun and other planets.

position.marginalia_text: ☉ occasu. At vera est hor. 20. m[inutae] 44 a ☉ occasu.

marginalia.translation: At sunset. And the true hour is 20, minute 44, from sunset.
